About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

I am a Full Stack Web Developer with a background in Political Science and Research Analysis. As an effective communicator and collaborator, i am efficient at self-managing during independent projects as well as collaborating in team settings. I have a keen eye for aesthetics and would love to channel that into building clean and beautiful user interfaces to enhance user experience! When im not coding, i can be found engaging in other activities that get my creative juices flowing: Painting, cooking and doing photography to name a few!
